t: What Is a Brand Extension Strategy - Definition & Examples
s: March 18, 2020 - While there are many stories of successful brand extensions, there are plenty that didn‚Äôt work out quite as well. The company easyGroup, most famous for airline easyJet, decided to open their own cinema, charging as little as 20p per ticket. However, film distributors decided against showing their films in the easyCinema. easyGroup lost revenue and was unable to pay the rent. They rebranded as a DVD rental company, LOVEFiLM, before ultimately selling to Amazon...
